Package net.royalur.rules

Class BasicPlayerStateProvider

java.lang.Object
net.royalur.rules.BasicPlayerStateProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
PlayerStateProvider<Piece,PlayerState>
public class BasicPlayerStateProvider extends Object implements PlayerStateProvider<Piece,PlayerState>
Provides new instances of, and manipulations to, standard player states.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    BasicPlayerStateProvider(int startingPieceCount)
    Creates a new standard player state provider.

    Description
    PlayerState
    applyPieceCaptured(PlayerState playerState, Piece piece)

    Generates a new player state that is a copy of playerState, with the given piece introduced to the board.

    Generates a new player state that is a copy of playerState, with the given piece scored.
